api_list.name: Auto Enhance post
api_list.description: Analyzes content of a social media post and returns arrays of suggested hashtags, images and final version of enhanced post

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: specify if post already contains a photo (if true, no image will be suggested and the response time will be significantly shorter)

api_list.name: Trending Hashtags
api_list.description: Returns an array of up to 20 hashtags trending in the last 24 hours (hourly floating averages)

optional_parameters.name: green
optional_parameters.description: restrict results only to green hashtags (currently popular)

optional_parameters.name: latin
optional_parameters.description: restrict results only to hashtags with latin characters

api_list.name: Influencers for Hashtag
api_list.description: Returns an array of up to 10 influential Twitter accounts using a specific hashtag

api_list.name: Historical data
api_list.description: Returns daily stats of a hashtag for the last 30 days (tweets, retweets, images, links, mentions etc.)

api_list.name: Social Media Coach
api_list.description: Analyzes content of a social media post and returns a tailored array of textual tips on how to improve the reach and engagement of that particular post

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: specify if post contains a photo

api_list.name: Hashtag stats
api_list.description: Returns an array of up to 10 hashtags most frequently used in tweets containing your query + returns stats on 'query hashtag' (hashtag created by adding # sign to your query).
